      Constructor for FunctionC
      Parameters:
      WeekOfYear - Number of weeks to be estimated for the harvest season in format of YYMM, e.g. 2301
      Cap_Labor - Labor resource planned for the production cycle (in Minute)
      Cap_Grape - Grape resource planned for the production cycle (in Kg)
      Prc_Rose - Price of Rose
      Prc_Noir - Price of P-Noir
      Bko_Rose - Backorder volume of RosÃ© (in Litre)
